summary: Implements a set of diffusion pipelines that coordinate the components of the Stable Cascade architecture—tokenizer, CLIP text and image encoders, diffusion prior, decoder, and VQGAN up‑sampler—to convert textual or visual prompts into high‑resolution images through latent space generation and progressive up‑sampling.
business_intent: Enable developers to integrate state‑of‑the‑art text‑to‑image generation into applications such as creative content creation, design prototyping, marketing assets, and AI‑driven visual media production.
